PAN Number (As printed on PAN card)
Hey, you have not participated in any quiz. Start playing quiz to earn.
Congrats, Your payment is successful. 100 coin has been added to your wallet.
Hey, We are creating a league for you. Please visit in some time to play and win.

Hey, Please join a league to win and earn. \n Go to Home, Click Games tab, Select the game you want to play and join a League.
Hi, This feature is coming soon
RoomId & Password will be updated in few seconds, Please refresh the page.

You have successfully joined in your friend team. 
 
 1. You can share TeamId with your friend if any one is left. 
 2. Now you can see your joined leagues in MyLeagues->Upcoming. 
 3. You can see your team details in MyLeagues->Upcoming->Click on View My Team. 
 4. You can view your RoomId and Password before 15 minutes of league start time. 
 5. Your joined league will be moved from upcoming to Live and there is button for View RoomId and Password.
Profile image is ready. Click update to save your profile image and details.
Click on edit below to update username

*This amount will be used to create your a team and your team mate doesn't have to pay. You can ask team mate to transfer the amount to your wallet using transfer coin option in Wallet.*
 1. Only one member of your team can create a team.
 2. After creating a team you will be get a Slot and TeamId. Share TeamId with your team mates.
 3. Your other team mates will join the team using TeamId on clicking Join Team. 
 4. You can see your created team details i.e Slot,TeamId & Team mates using option MyLeague->Upcoming->ViewMyTeam.
Have any issue in creating and joining team. Check this video to guide you through.
* Please enter your BattleGround India username in username field and BattleGround India game characterId in characterId field.\n Any wrong entry will not able to provide you winning amount.
* Please enter your Call of Duty username in username field.\n* Any wrong entry will not able to provide you winning amount.
* Please enter your FreeFire username in username field.\n* Please enter your Freefire UserId in userId field.\n* Any wrong entry will not able to provide you winning amount.
Team Name(You can choose any name)

1. You can only join a team if any of your team mates has created team and shared TeamId. 
 2. If your team mates has not created any team than you can create a team using Create Team. 
 3. Please enter the TeamId correctly which is shared by your team mate. 
 4. You don't have to pay any entry fee as your team leader has already paid entry fee during creating team. 
 5. Please be in your slot which is provided for your team otherwise you will be kicked out from the match.

1. This is your TeamId. Please share this with your team mates & ask them to join by clicking on Join Team. 
 2. Never share this TeamId to any unknown user other than your team mates. 
 3. You can view your team Slot,Team Id & Team Members details in My league->Upcoming->Click On View My Team. 
 4. You can view your RoomId and Password before 15 minutes of league start time. Your joined league will be moved from upcoming to Live and there is button View Room id and Password
You have successfully joined this league. To visit your joined league, click on \n MyLeague->Upcoming.
How to get my RoomId & Password? \n Click here to know!

View RoomId & Password 

 1. Your League will move from Upcoming to Live section on the Time of Match.
2. In live section. Click on 'View' Button to view the RoomId Password of the match. RoomId and Password will be pushed through notification also.
3. Match will start after 10 minutes of sharing the RoomId and Password.
*PLEASE BE IN YOUR SLOT WHICH WAS PROVIDED TO YOU*

1. This is not a final leaderboard.\n2. You can see the final leaderboard once the quiz is over.\n3. Once the quiz is finish, you can see leaderboard with the amount you have won.

This is upcoming quiz. You can play this quiz when it appears in live section.
How To Play & Join on Ludo King?\nClick to view!
1. Coins must be in multiple of 10. i.e 10,20,30,40,50...\n2. Challenge coins cannot be less than 10.
Hey, you have not participated in any challenge today. Create or Accept challenges now to play and earn.
You will not able to play quiz. Please provide storage permission.
Coins will be refunded to your wallet.\nAre you sure want to cancel this challenge?
" coins will be deducted from your wallet.\nAre you sure want to accept this challenge?
You have cancelled this challenge successfully. Coins have been refunded to your wallet.
You have successfully accepted the challenge. The challenge will appear in your My Challenges.
You have successfully created the challenge. The challenge will appear in your My Challenges.
You can update Ludo Room Code, once this challenge has been accepted.

1. Your opponent has been notified to start the play.
2. Wait for your opponent to join on Ludo King using your room code.
3. Click on Chat with Opponent option to start chatting.
4. Please update your result otherwise 25 coins will be deducted.
5. Updating result is mandatory.
Room Code has been updated successfully
Mobile number verification is required.\nWe will send an otp on your mobile number.
Enter six digit code received on your mobile number

1. If you have won, take a screenshot of winning page from LudoKing app. Click below on Won to upload the screenshot & than click on confirm to win.
2. If you have lost, just click on Lost (Mandatory). Otherwise 25coins will be deducted from your wallet.
3. Both players has to update the result within two hours after Room Code is updated.
4. If any opponent has not updated the result, winning coins will get credited to the winner wallet within 2–4 hours after uploading result.
5. Do not try any type of cheating and for your safety please record the game.
6. Please contact to our support team for any issue.
7. Ludo King app is required to play this game.
8. Captain have to the update room code within 15minutes otherwise 25coins will be deducted from the captain wallet and challenge will get cancelled. Opponent will get full challenge refund.
9. Quick Mode/5-6 player modes are not allowed in Khiladiadda.
10. Always select mode carefully and Play on that exactly same mode.
Make sure to upload the correct result of ludo king.
You have lost this challenge. Are you sure want to update the result?
How to get Ludo King username? Click to view!
How to get Ludo King username? Click to view!
Hey, You have successfully registered and received 5 coins in deposit wallet and 5 coins in bonus. Proceed to play and earn.

1. Now wait for some time till anyone accept your challenge.
2. After opponent has accepted your challenge, you have to update the Room Code.
3. You will get Room Code from Ludo King App.
4. Once the challenge is finished, please update the result.
5. 25 coins will be deducted, if you do not upload the result.
6. 25 coins will be deducted if you upload the wrong result.
7. Click on View Video option to know how to update Room Code.
8. You have to update the room code within 15 minutes otherwise 25 coins will deducted

1. Now wait for your opponent to update the Room Code.
2. When opponent will update the Room Code, you will receive a notification and you will also see a button(Play On Ludo King).
3. Once you click on (Play On Ludo King) button, you can see the Room Code and Join the room.
4. 25 coins will be deducted, if you do not upload the result.
5. 25 coins will be deducted if you upload the wrong result.
6. If your opponent does not update the room code in 30 minutes, then the challenge will be cancelled and your coins will be refunded automatically
Hey, you have not played any ludo challenges. Create or accept challenges to play and earn.
Hey, you have not played any CourtPiece Pro yet. Accept challenges to play and earn.
Sorry, the transaction was not successful. Please try again!
Transaction is cancelled as you have pressed back.
Payment Transaction is cancelled. Please try again.

You have already updated the result. \n1. Both players need to update the result to get instant winning.\n2. In case opponent has not updated the result, the winning will be credited automatically within 2–3hrs.

Your result has been updated successfully.\n1. Once the opponent has updated the result, you will get winning instantly.\n2. In case opponent has not updated the result, winning will get credited to your wallet within 2–3hrs.
Your result has been updated successfully.\nCreate or Join challenges to earn.
Make sure to upload the correct screenshot with the proper reason.
Beneficiary has been added successfully. Please select from below to withdraw amount.

Only use this option when there is any issue while playing or game was not completed.
1. For any wrong complaints,100 coins wil be deducted from your wallet.
2. If you aren't able to play due any reason than challenge coins will be refunded.
3. Make sure to upload proper screenshot of the issue and select the reason for the same.
Your issue has been raised to our support & we will resolve it in next 24hrs.\n1. Your challenged coins will be refunded, if found genuine.\n2. Keep on playing and winning.

1. Silver coins cannot be less than 20.
2. Silver coins must be multiple of 20.
3. You can transfer silver coins to deposit or bonus wallet.
4. 20 silver coins can be converted to 2 deposit wallet coins.
5. 20 silver coins can be converted to 5 bonus wallet coins.
You have not participated in this league

1. You can select only one combo from the following.
2. Same amount will get invested in selected combo as invested in substitute player combo.
3. Amount will not get deducted from your wallet.
4. You can use this feature to only change combo in which any player has been substituted or changed.
Aadhar Number (As printed on Aadhar Card)

Your Ongoing Matches will be listed here, Check Upcoming if Match is not started, and Check Past for matches that are completed. To participate in Matches open any Match and Create New Battle.

Your Matches that will start soon are listed here, Check Live for Matches that are still going on or Check Past for matches that are completed. To participate in Matches open any Match and Create New Battle.

Your Matches whose Results are declared are listed here, Check Live if Matches is still going on or Check Upcoming if the match is not started yet. To participate in Matches open any Match and Create New Battle.

If you want to withdraw more than Rs. 500 in a day then make sure that the above-entered details should match your verified Aadhar card details. \n\n यदि आप एक दिन में 500 रुपये से अधिक निकालना चाहते हैं तो ध्यान दें कि ऊपरी लिखी खाता जानकारी आपके द्वारा दर्ज आधार कार्ड की जानकारी के समान होनी चाहिए

Match Name & Password will be updated 15 minutes before the league start

View Match Name & Password 

 1. You can view your Match Name & Password before 15min of league start time.
2. Your joined league will be moved from Upcoming to Live in MyLeague before 15 minute from league start time and there is a button to view Match Name and Password.
3. You will also receive a notification with Match Name & Password before start time of your league.

Your GC amount is insufficient.\nPlease earn more GC for successful transaction.

1. प्रत्येक खिलाड़ी एक पासा फेंकता है; उच्चतम रोलर खेल शुरू करता है। खिलाड़ी बारी-बारी से दक्षिणावर्त दिशा में मुड़ते हैं।

 2. एक टोकन को उसके यार्ड से उसके शुरुआती वर्ग तक खेलने के लिए प्रवेश करने के लिए, एक खिलाड़ी को एक छक्का लगाना चाहिए। [7] [8] खिलाड़ी घर से हर बार एक छक्का प्राप्त करने के लिए एक टोकन ले सकते हैं जब तक कि घर खाली न हो या एक टुकड़ा छह बार स्थानांतरित न हो। स्टार्ट बॉक्स में दो स्वयं के टोकन हैं (दोगुना है)। यदि खिलाड़ी के पास खेलने के लिए अभी तक कोई टोकन नहीं है और एक छक्के के अलावा अन्य रोल करता है, तो बारी अगले खिलाड़ी के पास जाती है।खिलाड़ियों को हमेशा रोल किए गए डाई वैल्यू के अनुसार टोकन ले जाना चाहिए।
 
 3. एक बार जब खिलाड़ियों के पास खेलने के लिए एक या एक से अधिक टोकन होते हैं, तो वे एक टोकन का चयन करते हैं और इसे ट्रैक के साथ आगे की ओर ले जाते हैं, मरने से संकेतित वर्गों की संख्या।

"1. Each player rolls a die; the highest roller begins the game. Players alternate turns in a clockwise direction.

2. To enter a token into play from its yard to its starting square, a player must roll a six.[7][8] Players can draw a token from home every time they get a six unless home is empty or move a piece six times. The start box has two own tokens (is doubled). If the player has no tokens yet in play and rolls other than a six, the turn passes to the next player.

3. Players must always move a token according to the die value rolled. Once players have one or more tokens in play, they select a token and move it forwards along the track the number of squares indicated by the die. "
Please add amount to proceed.\nMinimum amount to be added is Rs.10

resources.string: Please Join your tournament by clicking on below Play Now button.
If you not Click on Play Now button in 5 minutes then you will lost the tournament.

"1. Get flat 10% Cashback up to ₹50 on adding money via Bajaj Pay Wallet.
2. Minimum order value will be ₹10.
3. Maximum cashback amount will be ₹50.
4. Cashback will get credited within 7 days to users Bajaj pay Wallet.
5. Applicable thrice per user for a month.
6. Valid till 30th June, 2023"

"1. Get flat 10% Cashback up to ₹50 on adding money via Bajaj Pay UPI.
2. Minimum order value will be ₹10.
3. Maximum cashback amount will be ₹50.
4. Cashback will get credited within 7 days to users Bajaj pay Wallet.
5. Applicable thrice per user for a month.
6. Valid till 31st May, 2023"
UPI: Choose from any UPI option below
